name: Palo Alto Software Plan Component File
summary: Learn about .PDP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Business Plan Pro provides more than 500 business plan samples that you can edit and use as your own. The software also features step-by-step guidance, plan settings for nonprofits, automatic charts and graphs, and and answers to legal questions.

description: Plan component file created by Business Plan Pro, an application used to create business plans; contains a component of a plan, which may be a table, equation, chart, or topic; can be downloaded and imported into your plan.
